```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "How.often.did.you.fire.rounds.at.the.enemy."
t <- "How often did you fire rounds at the enemy?"
q_data <- get_single_selection(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
r <- plot_single_select(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
q_plot2 <- rbind(q_plot, t)
dir.create("output/q85_fire_rounds_enemy")
ggsave(filename = 'output/q85_fire_rounds_enemy/q85_fire_rounds_enemy.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot2, paste0("output/q85_fire_rounds_enemy/q85_fire_rounds_enemy_", q_n,".csv"), row.names=F)
```

```{r}
qf_data <- q_data %>%
  filter(response == "Response text")
```

```{r}
qf_all_data <- 
  qf_data %>%
  inner_join(q_data, by = "id")
qf_n <- length(unique(qf_all_data$id))
q_plot <- clean_single_select_y(qf_all_data)
r <- plot_single_select_y(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
q_plot2 <- rbind(q_plot, t)
dir.create("output/q85_fire_rounds_enemy")
ggsave(filename = 'output/q85_fire_rounds_enemy/q85_fire_rounds_enemy.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot2, paste0("output/q85_fire_rounds_enemy/q85_fire_rounds_enemy_", qf_n,".csv"), row.names=F)
```
